content.query:
SELECT TOP (100) [LoanNr_ChkDgt]
,[Name]
,[City]
,[State]
,[Zip]
,[Bank]
,[BankState]
,[NAICS]
,[ApprovalDate]
,[ApprovalFY]
,[Term]
,[NoEmp]
,[NewExist]
,[CreateJob]
,[RetainedJob]
,[FranchiseCode]
,[UrbanRural]
,[RevLineCr]
,[LowDoc]
,[DisbursementDate]
,[DisbursementGross]
,[BalanceGross]
,[MIS_Status]
,[ChgOffPrinGr]
,[GrAppv]
,[SBA_Appv]
 FROM [dbo].[SBACurated2]


 ALTER TABLE SBACurated2 DROP COLUMN GrAppv
